title: Privacy page: replace Section 12 contact details with link to /contacto

requirements.summary: Update only Section 12 ("Contacto") on /privacy to remove hardcoded store contact details and replace with a single paragraph plus a standalone router Link to /contacto.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/pages/public/PrivacyPage.tsx, the Section 12 contact area no longer renders the div with class `bg-muted p-6 rounded-lg space-y-3`.
Section 12 no longer displays any individual contact details (store name, email, phone, address) and does not include `mailto:` or `tel:` links.

Section 12 retains an introductory paragraph, updated to: "Si tienes preguntas, inquietudes o solicitudes relacionadas con esta Política de Privacidad o nuestras prácticas de datos, contáctanos a través de nuestra página de contacto."

Immediately after that paragraph, Section 12 renders a Link (from @tanstack/react-router) pointing to `/contacto` with visible link text exactly "Ir a la página de contacto" and className exactly `text-primary hover:underline`.
No other sections, headings, layout, or styling on /privacy are modified outside Section 12.

file_operations.description: Within Section 12 "Contacto" only: remove the entire hardcoded contact-details block (the div with class `bg-muted p-6 rounded-lg space-y-3`) and remove any remaining individual contact details and `mailto:`/`tel:` links. Replace the current intro paragraph text with exactly: "Si tienes preguntas, inquietudes o solicitudes relacionadas con esta Política de Privacidad o nuestras prácticas de datos, contáctanos a través de nuestra página de contacto." Then render a standalone `Link` from `@tanstack/react-router` immediately after that paragraph with `to="/contacto"`, visible text exactly "Ir a la página de contacto", and `className="text-primary hover:underline"`. Do not change any other sections or styles outside Section 12, and do not add any fetching/loading/error logic.
